intro.name: Harry Potter
intro.tagline: Head Auror at Ministry of Magic
intro.quote: The ones who love us never really leave us.

about.label: About Me
about.value: Experienced wizard and Defense Against the Dark Arts specialist with a proven track record of defeating dark wizards. Graduate of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, where I served as the youngest Seeker in a century for the Gryffindor Quidditch team. Led Dumbledore's Army and defeated Lord Voldemort. Currently serving as Head Auror at the Ministry of Magic, focusing on magical law enforcement and dark wizard capture.

responsibilities: Lead investigations into Dark Magic activities
Coordinate with international magical law enforcement

values.institute: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
values.result: Outstanding in Defense Against the Dark Arts

values.title: Advanced Defensive Magic: The Power of Love-Based Protection Spells
values.authors: Harry J. Potter, Hermione Granger, Ronald Weasley
values.abstract: An analysis of ancient love-based protection spells and their modern applications in magical defense

values.title: Order of Merlin, First Class
values.event: Awarded for defeating Lord Voldemort and protecting the wizarding world

values.title: Youngest Seeker in Century
values.event: Became Gryffindor Quidditch Seeker at age 11
